New Records: Highest individual score: 158 - Matthew Hayden (AUS) vs West Indies, 2007
Best bowling figures: 5/27 - Jason Holder (WI) vs India, 2017
Highest team score: 326/6 - West Indies vs England, 2023
Pre-Game Insights: England see this series as a much-needed preparation for next year's ICC Champions Trophy in Pakistan
West Indies also had a forgettable white-ball tour to Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Antigua pitch will have a good pace and bounce initially
